fields.title: The Holiday
fields.description: Two women from different countries swap homes for the holidays and unexpectedly find love.
fields.starring: Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jude Law, Jack Black

fields.title: Happiest Season
fields.description: A woman plans to propose to her girlfriend during a Christmas visit, only to discover she hasnâ€™t come out to her conservative parents.
fields.starring: Kristen Stewart, Mackenzie Davis, Alison Brie, Dan Levy

fields.title: Carol
fields.description: An aspiring photographer develops an intimate relationship with an older woman in 1950s New York.

fields.title: Home Alone
fields.description: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his home from two bungling burglars after being left behind at Christmas.
fields.starring: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara

fields.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
fields.description: Kevin McCallister finds himself alone in New York City and once again faces off against the Wet Bandits.
fields.starring: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara

fields.title: Home Alone 3
fields.description: A young boy defends his house from international spies who mistake his toy car for a classified device.

fields.title: Snow Day
fields.description: A group of kids plan to keep schools closed by preventing the snowplow driver from clearing the streets.
fields.starring: Chevy Chase, Mark Webber, Schuyler Fisk

fields.title: Die Hard
fields.description: A New York City cop, John McClane, tries to save his estranged wife and several others taken hostage by terrorists during a Christmas Eve party at the Nakatomi Plaza Skyscraper in Los Angeles, California.
fields.writer: Roderick Thorp, Jeb Stuart, Steven E. de Souza
fields.starring: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia

fields.title: Jingle Bell Heist
fields.description: At the height of the holiday season, two strangers team up to rob one of London's most famous department stores while accidentally falling in love.
